skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: Skilled front-end developer specializing in creating captivating user experiences through proficient utilization of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, with a keen eye for design, interactivity, and cross-browser compatibility.

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: Experienced back-end developer adept at building the foundational structure of web applications, utilizing server-side languages and databases to ensure smooth functionality, data management, and secure user interactions.

skills.title: UI & UX Design
skills.description: Creative UI/UX designer passionate about crafting intuitive and visually appealing digital experiences, merging user-centric design principles with innovative interfaces to enhance usability and drive user satisfaction.

skills.title: React Development
skills.description: Seasoned React developer adept at building interactive and dynamic user interfaces, harnessing the power of component-based architecture and state management to create fast, modular, and engaging web applications.

portfolio.title: React JS Portfolio
portfolio.description: My portfolio react application is my first solo react app that i created to help me understand the use of routes and links in react.

portfolio.title: Py Fighter
portfolio.description: This is my first solo project that i created to help me understand the use of classes in python better.  It is an unfinished project that i am still working on.

portfolio.title: Python Projects
portfolio.description: In this repository you will find my Python Projects that i created during my studies, which include blackjack and hangman games as well as class work.
